title: How to Install Garry's Mod Add Ons

steps.title: Begin by choosing the addon which you would like to use on Garry's Mod.
steps.content: Begin by choosing the addon which you would like to use on Garry's Mod. Addons can be downloaded from various websites, the most popular of which is GarrysMods.org .

steps.title: Once you have chosen the addon you wish to install, download both it and any other necessary files.
steps.content: Once you have chosen the addon you wish to install, download both it and any other necessary files.

steps.title: If the file(s) is/are zip/rar files, use a file extraction program such as WinRAR to un-zip/rar them; otherwise, leave them alone.
steps.content: If the file(s) is/are zip/rar files, use a file extraction program such as WinRAR to un-zip/rar them; otherwise, leave them alone.

steps.title: If the file(s) came with installer(s) use such programs to install the addon hassle-free.
steps.content: If the file(s) came with installer(s) use such programs to install the addon hassle-free. If not, they will typically have several files contained within a main folder ( please note: some addons may have unnecessary folders containing the main folder, in such a case you should remove the main folder from the folders containing it.) Extract this main folder to c:\program files\steam\steamapps\yoursteamname\garrysmod\garrysmod\addons .
